title: BROKE vs PRO Flight Simulator
description: This time we take on Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 for BROKE vs PRO. Free 32GB Flash Drive & 32GB Micro SD Card: Get the best prices and best selection at Micro Center: Micro Center Custom PC Builder: How to Choose Parts for Your Custom Computer Build: Limited Time Offer, Valid In-store only, Limit 1 Coupon Per Customer  Kens Pro Setup: PowerSpec G464 Gaming Computer: Thrustmaster T-16000M FCS Flight Stick: Thrustmaster TWCS Throttle: Thrustmaster TFRP T.Flight Rudder Pedals: SteelSeries Arctis Pro + GameDAC Wired Gaming Headset: SteelSeries Rival 600 Gaming Mouse: SteelSeries APEX 7 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard: SteelSeries QcK Prism Cloth  XL: Dell Alienware AW3420DW 34" WQHD 120Hz Curved IPS Monitor:  Austins Broke Setup: AMD Ryzen 3 3100: Gigabyte B450 AORUS M Motherboard: PowerColor Radeon RX 570 Red Dragon: Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3200 CL16 RAM: Inland Professional 240GB SSD: PowerSpec 550 Watt 80 Plus Bronze Power Supply: Thermaltake V100 Mid-Tower Computer Case  Black: AOC E2070SWHN 19.5" Monitor:  My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  I stream on Twitch now!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
